member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesXmlFeed.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary:
The Page_Load event handler on this User Control obtains an xml document and xsl/t transform file location. It then sets these properties on an <asp:Xml> server control.
Patch 11/11/2003 by Manu: Errors are logged.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesXmlFeed.GetXSLListForFeedTransformations
member.summary:
Author: Joe Audette Added: 7/31/2003 Allows you to add stylesheets for new feed formats without recompiling. Any xslt stylesheets placed in the folder specified in the web.config willshow up in the dropdown list
Patch 11/11/2003 by Manu: Errors are logged.

member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesXmlFeed.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
